releases.title: April 2025 Update
releases.description: This update brings several new features and improvements to the Poly Micro Manager.

changes.description: Added new microservice testing capabilities with improved UI
Introduced automatic release management system
Enhanced dashboard performance and responsiveness
Fixed authentication issues when logging in with certain email providers

releases.title: April 2025 Update
releases.description: This update brings several new features and improvements to the Poly Micro Manager.

changes.description: Added new microservice testing capabilities with improved UI

releases.title: March 2025 Update
releases.description: This update focuses on improving the monitoring capabilities and fixing several bugs.

changes.description: Added real-time monitoring dashboard
Optimized microservice discovery process
Fixed issue with project selection in the dashboard

releases.title: Initial Release
releases.description: The first stable release of Poly Micro Manager.

changes.description: Core microservice management functionality
Basic authentication and user management
Project configuration and setup
